widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Justia X Open AI Hackathon.
config.description: Our Engineering Team had the opportunity to use the Open AI APIs to develop a functional proof of concepts in a two-day Hackathon. New products and features will reflect their learning and contributions in the upcoming months.

config.title: IT Team.
config.description: As always, our team kept on top of our server infrastructure and took care of maintenance and security updates to various Justia properties, such as the Justia Lawyer Directory, Justia Case Law, and JWeb, to name a few.

config.title: Justia Lawyer Directory.
config.description: Our team made multiple improvements to our lawyer directory, including updates to the A2A email invitations, client review moderation tools, and added a Justia Connect Pro promotional block in the Justia Profile dashboard.

config.title: Justia Connect.
config.description: We continue to improve Justia Connect by integrating new features like alerting Justia Connect Pro members about credits expiration and improvements to Justia CLE Webinars. We also added a Justia Connect Pro tooltip on various properties to promote the product better and added a sticky banner to Justia Accounts.

config.title: QA Automation Team.
config.description: Our QA Team expanded our automated QA coverage for some properties, including Justia Brand and Justia Ask A Lawyer, and improved support for our JLD monthly report.

config.title: GA4.
config.description: Continuing with the migration to GA4 for all our public properties, this month, we included tracking for some of our Justia Friends websites, such as Joanna Grossman’s website, Stanford Copyright & Fair Use site, and Eric Goldman's blogs.

config.title: Blogging Ideas Migration.
config.description: This month, we completed the migration of our Blogging Ideas users to the Justia Daily Opinion Summary Newsletters, given that we discontinued that service this month.
